Bio
x
William H. McDonald III

I have spent the last 15 years in music education and I am now a software developer. I started out software development learning Python. However, my present job is building native and web apps in C#. I am also up-to-date in most web technologies. I know Python Django and I can develop in React, Angular, and Vue. I need to give a lot of credit to Free Code Camp without which I would not have learned development as quickly or as excellently.

11 years of my life were lived in China. 2 years were in Beijing and 9 years were spent in the beautiful coastal city of Qingdao. That experience has instilled a global perspective, given me a family, and given me a second language. 不用问，我当然会讲汉语.

Beyond this, I have skills in 3D art and have done several freelance jobs including logo design and vehicle modeling. I am also an avid runner and a loyal family man.

Skills
